hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common

Class BombEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.BombEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BombEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Event for a bomb explosion. This event is triggered when a bomb explodes. It contains the userID, type of the bomb, position and all fields that are affected by the explosion. It does NOT trigger any event or destroy objects. Also it adds fields that are not reached in "reality" because they are behind undestroyable objects.
    Author:
    Marco Egger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
